channel.title: Assassin's 2nd day ability
channel.description: Right now assassin honestly has one of the weakest abilities in distract like why would anyone use that? Here is my idea-Day ability-Forage-Forage for some nightshade giving you an extra use of nightshade This lets you poison more people and makes you choose between poisoning someone or getting another use of nightshade. or Day ability-Without a trace-You will be gone from your room that night preventing you from talking to the the other unseen members and from being visited.This prevents the prince from jailing you as he can't find you when he tries to jail you.

item.title: Assassin's 2nd day ability
item.dc:creator: Bart_Auringer
item.description:
Well the distract ability is pretty useless, but not sure about that as a replacement.

This lets you poison more people and makes you choose between poisoning someone or getting another use of nightshade.
or Day ability-Without a trace-You will be gone from your room that night preventing you from talking to the the other unseen members and from being visited.This prevents the prince from jailing you as he canâ€™t find you when he tries to jail you.
